sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 20, 2026 –

Due to the conditions of the trail there will be no grooming until further notice.  The trail is still open for skiing with current trail conditions being extremely slushy.  The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks lives!  Still a connection all the way around.  And the tracks are still there, frozen but usable .Refreezing when I was out (3-4/30pm) with still a lot of spots that are still white and not boilerplate.  Some dirt showing thru in only a few spots.  There is debris from the wind but actually not as bad as I thought.  They should be able to groom it for decent conditions this weekend.  Hopefully it won’t bring up to much dirt.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Outstanding today - perfect groom over 28” hardpack , blue sky , sweet spot timing between 10:30 and 12:30 - simply wonderful!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Thursday. Coverage is very good, we will not groom until the snow firms up.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Rain is expected this morning, but it is forecast to transition to snow around noon today. The snow never froze last night so expect a loose spring wet snow today. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is Clam Chowder. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Even with some premature snow this morning, make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
